entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,128001}Master {F843,0}, I have a dispatch{F801}for you from another Samurai.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,128001}Master {F843,0}, I have a dispatch{F801}for you from another Samurai.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Man\0{F87A,17}{F813,0,128002}...You're late. I'm tired of waiting.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,128003}{F843,0} of the Eastern Kingdom{F801}of Mikado... It's nice to meet you.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,128004}I'm Tayama of the Ashura-kai.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Man\0{F87A,17}{F813,0,128002}...You're late. I'm tired of waiting.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,128003}{F843,0} of the Eastern Kingdom{F801}of Mikado... It's nice to meet you.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,128004}I'm Tayama of the Ashura-kai.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,0,128005}You should do as I say. Because if{F801}you try to pull anything...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,0,128005}You should do as I say. Because if{F801}you try to pull anything...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,154}{F813,0,128006}C-Can you hear me? My fellows...!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,128007}Save me! The Ashura-kai caught me--{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,154}{F813,0,128006}C-Can you hear me? My fellows...!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,128007}Save me! The Ashura-kai caught me--{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,0,128009}Go to Club Milton here in town.{F801}One of my boys there will explain{F801}things to you.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,0,128009}Go to Club Milton here in town.{F801}One of my boys there will explain{F801}things to you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,0,128010}Make me proud, kiddos.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,0,128010}Make me proud, kiddos.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,3,1,1}{F813,0,128012}Damnation! We've been had!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,3,1,1}{F813,0,128012}Damnation! We've been had!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F813,0,128013}The coward, bargaining with the life{F801}of one of our fellows...!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F813,0,128013}The coward, bargaining with the life{F801}of one of our fellows...!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,0,128014}"Club Milton," did he say? We seem{F801}to have little choice but to do as{F801}he demands.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,0,128014}"Club Milton," did he say? We seem{F801}to have little choice but to do as{F801}he demands.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,86020}This seems like important evidence.{F801}I'll make a note of it in the quest.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,86020}This seems like important evidence.{F801}I'll make a note of it in the quest.{F801}
